name: Treasure Valley
description:
You are a camper in a valley by night. It's dark and you have a treasure to hunt. Unfortunately, you are not the only thing at hunt in Treasure Valley tonight.

Find as many treasures as you can before being caught by the ghost.

W-A-S-D or arrow keys to move. Mouse to point, left click to toggle flashlight and right click to sprint

DISCLAIMER : none of the visual arts in this game is made by me, except for the ghost. Talented artists are all from Open Game Art :)
